message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $10000 for it. Could we possibly negotiate a price closer to that amount?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I appreciate your interest in the product and am willing to work with you. How about we meet in the middle at $12500? This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit while offering you a good deal.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on a price closer to $10000?

Bob, I understand your budget limitations. While I value the product highly, I'm willing to compromise further to ensure a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you consider $11000? This price reflects the value of the product while staying within your budget constraints.
